title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Christina Jewett, enterprise team, Kaiser Health News @by_cjewett
description: A guide on how to fact-check and investigate healthcare facilities, including tips on obtaining facility inspection reports, analyzing SEC filings, and finding people.
